author: John Ficenec
title: Questor share tip: Hold Shell as balance strong enough to support dividend
text: Questor Questor share tip: Hold Shell as balance strong enough to support dividend The FTSE 100 oil major has endured a turbulent year but the dividend and the balance sheet still look solid enough, says Questor. Shell investors have plenty of time to make up their minds about the Â£47bn deal for BG Group Photo: GETTY IMAGES By John Ficenec , Questor Editor 4:59PM BST 12 Oct 2015
